description: Python library and shell utilities to monitor filesystem events.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-argh
dependencies.description:
An argparse wrapper that doesn't make you say "argh" each time you deal
with it. Building a command-line interface? Found yourself uttering
"argh!" while struggling with the API of argparse? Don't like the
complexity but need the power? Argh is a smart wrapper for argparse.
Argparse is a very powerful tool; Argh just makes it easy to use.

dependent_to.name: py-streamlit
dependent_to.description: The fastest way to build data apps in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-mkdocs
dependent_to.description:
MkDocs is a fast, simple and downright gorgeous static site generator
that's geared towards building project documentation.
